did.unittitle: Letters and clippings regarding Henry Ward Beecher
did.abstract: Three letters, including one from Colonel Nelson Cross, another from Robert Dale Owen regarding a meeting with Beecher; two newspaper clippings, one from the New York Herald about Beecher's talent for dramatic storytelling; the other about a Thanksgiving sermon Beecher gave.
